name: Electron (Anurag1212)
description:
This game was created as a entry for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.1.

In just 5 days,by just 1 guy🤪🤪

Also it was my first game jam game😁😁

Electron is small, 2D hypercasual game with some stunning graphics and sounds. The game is based on Theme HOLES which was the theme of game jam.  The game mechanics are totally physics based so you can expect some joyful gameplay.Also it has been massively inspired from DaniDev's BALLS? 

Game has a tutorial level which will explain the plot of game and controls pretty clearly,just don't skip it😉😉. (or you can't😈😈) 

Music used in the is totally royalty free and is composed by EVAN KING.
